content:
Reminder to hop on the community stream today at 2023-10-31T07:00:00-04:00

On today's agenda we have updates from both @Mossaka (Joe) and @Pat Hickey.

  • Golang Subgroup of SIG Guest Languages (@mossaka)
  • WASI 0.2 (@pchickey, @ricochet)
  • Wasmtime (@pchickey)
  • Upcoming events (@ricochet)
